name: Elder Scrolls or Fallout 4 Relative Save Data
summary: Learn about .TES files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In addition to TES files created by the games mentioned above, modders may encounter TES files created by the Bethesda Softworks Creation Kit. On rare occasions, Creation Kit saves ESP, ESM, or ESL files that a modder is working on as TES files. To correct this error, rename the incorrectly-saved TES file to use the .esp, .esm, or .esl extension.

instructions: Most TES files are not meant to be opened or altered by players. If you are a modder, and your TES file was previously an ESP, ESM, or ESL file, you can rename the file to use the correct extension and open it in Bethesda Softworks Creation Kit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
